channel.title: Space Industry on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Space Industry on FinanClub

item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:-10 Chances: Rocket Lab USA, Inc. has reported strong performance in its full-year 2023 results despite a net loss increase The introduction of a family of spacecraft buses is a positive development and showcases Rocket Lab’s space systems capabilities The successful return of a custom spacecraft for Varda Space Industries highlights Rocket Lab’s expertise in in-space manufacturing and logistics Risks: The net loss increase reported by Rocket Lab USA, Inc.
